author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Update GTs in autoCond with the new JEC tags from https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/gt-offline-updates-of-jec-tags-for-analysis-in-2022-24/132787

The following GTs had been updated in autoCond:

 - 'phase1_2022_realistic':
 [150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v2)
, diff wrt to _v1 is [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v1/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v2)
- 'phase1_2022_realistic_postEE': [150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v2)
, diff wrt _v1 GT is [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v1/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v2)

- 'phase1_2023_realistic': [150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v2)
, diff wrt to _v1 is [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v1/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v2)
- 'phase1_2023_realistic_postBPix': [150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_postBPix_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_postBPix_v2)
, diff wrt to _v1 is [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_postBPix_v1/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_postBPix_v2)
- 'phase1_2024_realistic': [150X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v3)
, diff wrt _v2 is [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v2/150X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v3)

-  'run3_data': [150X_dataRun3_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/150X_dataRun3_v6),
diff wrt to v4 is [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_dataRun3_v4/150X_dataRun3_v6)

#### PR validation:

Successfully tested in master

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #49354
title: [CMSSW_15_0X] Update the JEC tags in analysis GTs for 2022-24
